scripts.clean: yarn workspaces foreach exec rm -rf dist
scripts.clean:hard: yarn clean:cache && yarn clean && yarn clean:nm
scripts.release: yarn build && yarn test && npm version -ws `npm dist-tags @ddd-ts/model | grep latest | awk '{ print $2 }' | cut -d'-' -f1`-$((`npm dist-tags @ddd-ts/model | grep latest | awk '{ print $2 }' | cut -d'-' -f2`+1)) && npm publish --access public --workspaces
